title: Are you happy that Tom Sneddon is dead for what he did to Michael Jackson? - Quora

response.answer_text: I sure am. Sneddon was an evil sonuvabitch who wanted to ruin Michael and he framed him for child molestation, which Michael didn’t do. Sneddon, for all we know, is now burning in Hell.

I have mixed feelings because while I’m happy that bastard is dead. He didn’t suffer long enough. I want to see him go through the same pain Michael went through. I’m livid that both Evan Chandler and Tom Sneddon died easy. They don’t deserve to have it easy.
No! His death cannot bring MJ to life. But he dont even clear MJ befor he died. Im not happy but im still bad to him for what he did. Im being hypocrite if i say not.
